pr_title: Add a simple description to POM.

timeline.message: Add a simple description to POM.

timeline.bodyText: Oops - meant to add the next line in the future, but did this instead.
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,8 +34,16 @@ nexusStaging {
   packageGroup = "io.opentelemetry"
   username = System.getenv('SONATYPE_USER')
   password = System.getenv('SONATYPE_KEY')
+
+  // We have many artifacts so Maven Central takes a long time on its compliance checks. This sets
+  // the timeout for waiting for the repository to close to a comfortable 50 minutes.
+  numberOfRetries = 300
+  delayBetweenRetriesInMillis = 10000
 }
 
+// Enable after verifying Maven Central publishing once through manual closing
